about_the_game:
This high-quality sound pack is perfect for action RPGs and shooting games!

It includes themes for main gameplay, combat, tutorials, configuration screens, and various other events, all crafted to fit a cohesive world view.

With looping tags, the ogg and m4a files are ready to be seamlessly integrated into your game right away.

*******************************************

Contents:

OGG files: 13 items

M4A files: 13 items

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
